  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AudioFrame()
    Create the audio frame with default parameters 2 channels, 48kHz and a number of frames, where each frame is equivalent to 10ms audio

  • Method Details

    • getNumFrames

      public int getNumFrames()
      Get the current number of samples within the audio frame
      Returns:
      the number of samples

    • setNumFrames

      public void setNumFrames(int numFrames)
      Set the number of audio frames of this frame. Each frame is equivalent to some time length of playback, and contains a number of samples that is equivalent to the number of channels. For example, if each frame provided is equivalent to 10 ms of playback, then the number of frames is 10 ms * sampleRate.
      Parameters:
      numFrames - The number of frames contains in this object.

    • getNumChannels

      public int getNumChannels()
      Get the number of channel of this frame
      Returns:
      The number of channels

    • setNumChannels

      Set the number of channels of this frame
      Parameters:
      numChannels - The number of channels

    • getBitsPerSample

      public int getBitsPerSample()
      Get the number of bits per sample (16 by default).
      Returns:
      The number of bits per sample

    • getAudioData

      Returns:

    • setAudioData

      public void setAudioData(byte[] audioData)

      Parameters:
